obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_46_0: * As promised^1, here is your reward!/
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_65_0: * You'll just have to try again^1, boss!/%
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_77_0: * Hey^1! That's not how you \cYSPARE\cW someone!/
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_78_0: * ..^1. but I guess a win is a win./
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_99_0: * But you already won that prize^1, so we don't have another!/%
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_105_0: * ...I don't have any more to give. You've already taken everything I have./%
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_115_0: * Boss^1! For bullets aimed right at you^1, try moving \cYone direction bit by bit\cW...!/%
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_120_0: * Boss^1! Try to remember your ABCs...!/%
obj_npc_dojo_slash_Step_0_gml_61_0: * You beefed it! Better luck next time^1, boss!/%
